sentences.sContent: Internet makes main communication line in epicenter of slope god earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Internet makes main communication line in epicenter of slope god earth.
sentences.sCn: 因特网在阪神大地震中成为主要的通信线路。

sentences.sContent: Not only has the epicenter of the quake shifted, but, so far, the tremors have shaken markets differently.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only has the epicenter of the quake shifted, but, so far, the tremors have shaken markets differently.
sentences.sCn: 不仅地震的震中发生了转移，而且迄今余震以不同的方式震撼了市场。

sentences.sContent: Some 1300 rescue and relief troops arrived at Wenchuan County, the epicenter of Monday's major quake with military doctors and soldiers searching for survivors and treating the injured.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some 1300 rescue and relief troops arrived at Wenchuan County, the epicenter of Monday's major quake with military doctors and soldiers searching for survivors and treating the injured.
sentences.sCn: 13日下午，约1300人的救援团队首次抵达此次地震的震中汶川县。 医生和救援官兵已立即开始冒雨搜寻幸存者、救治伤者。

remMethod.val: epi(挨劈) + center(中心) → 土地挨劈的中心 → 震中
